articles.title: Euro 2020: I would have picked more right-backs for England squad - Southgate - BBC News
articles.description: Gareth Southgate says if he could have picked five or six right-backs for England's European Championship campaign he "would have done".
articles.content:
Trent Alexander-Arnold, Reece James, Kieran Trippier and Kyle Walker (not pictured) will all be competing for the right-back slot

articles.author: Joe Barnes, Brussels Correspondent
articles.title: EU funded Wuhan lab: European Commission faces probe over thousands of euros sent to China - Daily Express
articles.description: THE European Union has helped fund the Chinese research laboratory that could have triggered the global pandemic with a coronavirus leak.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Consider global shortages before giving COVID-19 shots to teens, EU body says - Reuters
articles.description: European Union countries should take account of global shortages of COVID-19 vaccines before rolling out shots for adolescents, the European Centre for Disease prevention and Control (ECDC) said on Tuesday.
